targets.expr: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp) as time, COUNT(*) as value FROM audit_log WHERE event_type IN ('LOGIN', 'LOGIN_ERROR') AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT decision, COUNT(*) FROM authorization_log WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' GROUP BY decision

SELECT resource_id, classification, COUNT(*) as denial_count FROM authorization_log WHERE decision = false AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' GROUP BY resource_id, classification ORDER BY denial_count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) as time, source_realm, COUNT(*) as value FROM federation_log WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' GROUP BY time, source_realm ORDER BY time
SELECT metadata->>'acr' as aal_level, COUNT(*) FROM audit_log WHERE event_type = 'LOGIN' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' GROUP BY aal_level
SELECT COUNT(*) as total, MIN(timestamp) as oldest FROM audit_log
